Name: 2nd Hearing Holding Reminder
Description: Second holding email when hearing not booked

Name: 3rd Hearing Holding Reminder
Description: Third holding email when hearing not booked

Name: Action Postponement Request
EventEnablingCondition: unprocessedPostponementRequest="Yes" AND interlocReviewState!="awaitingInformation" AND interlocReviewState!="none" AND interlocReviewState!="awaitingAdminAction" AND interlocReviewState!="welshTranslation" AND interlocReviewState!=""

Name: Add / update SC number
Description: Add a SC number to the case

Name: Add a note
Description: The online hearing has resolved the case

Name: Add a representative
Description: Add a rep or supporters details to a case

Name: Add a hearing
Description: Add a hearing to the case
Deprecated - Admin - send to Draft Archived
Name: Admin - send to Draft Archived
Admin - send to Ready to List
Amend a bundle
Description: Amend a bundle in the case

Name: Amend interloc review state
Description: Ability to amend interloc review state flag

Name: Appeal received
Description: Notification that an appeal has been received

Name: Appeal registered (DWP)
Description: Appeal successfully registered on PIP CS

Name: Appeal to proceed
Description: Appeal to proceed doesn't do bulk scan validation as this is done as part of the issueDirection

Name: Appeal withdrawn
Description: Notification that an appeal has been withdrawn

Name: Assign panel to online hearing
Description: Assign Judge, Medical member and Disability qualified member

Name: Associate case
Description: Soft links two cases - automatically based on NINO

Name: Attach robotics jSON
Description: The Robotics JSON has been attached to the case

Name: COR answers submitted
Description: The appellant has submitted their answers

Name: COR deadline extension denied
Description: The request for the deadline to answer the questions to be extended has been denied

Name: COR deadline extension granted
Description: The request for the deadline to answer the questions to be extended has been granted

Name: COR online hearing relisted
Description: The online hearing has been relisted to an oral hearing

Name: COR preliminary view issued
Description: The tribunal have issued their preliminary view

Name: COR question deadline elapsed
Description: The deadline for the appellant to answer the round of questions has expired

Name: COR question deadline reminder
Description: The appellant has been sent a reminder to answer the questions

Name: COR question dealine extended
Description: The deadline for the appellant to answer the round of questions been extended

Name: COR question round issued
Description: A round of questions has been issued to the appellant

Name: Create a bundle
Description: Create a bundle in the case

Name: Create an edited bundle
Description: Create an edited bundle in the case

Name: Create/update Panel
Description: Add Judge, Medical member and Disability qualified member

Name: Death of appellant
Description: Record the death of an appellant

Name: Death of appellant actioned
Description: Action the death of an appellant

Name: Decisions/directions to DWP
Description: Log sending decisions or directions to DWP

Name: Draft to incomplete appeal
Description: Convert draft case to incomplete application received

Name: Draft to non-compliant appeal
Description: Convert draft case to non-compliant appeal

Name: Draft to valid appeal created
Description: Convert draft case to new valid appeal

Name: DWP Response Late Reminder
Description: Holding email when DWP has not responded in time

Name: Evidence received
Description: Notification that evidence has been received

Name: Final Hearing Holding Reminder
Description: Final holding email when hearing not booked

Name: Generate appeal PDF
Description: Creates an appeal PDF if it's missing

Name: Hearing adjourned
Description: Notification that the hearing has been adjourned

Name: Hearing booked
Description: Notification about a hearing being booked

Name: Hearing Holding Reminder
Description: Holding email when hearing not booked

Name: Hearing postponed
Description: Notification that a hearing has been postponed

Name: Issue final decision
Description: Issue a final decision notice for a case

Name: Joint Party Added
Description: Joint Party has been registered on case

Name: Link a case
Description: Link a case - hard link - if cases need to be heard together

Name: Log sending to judge
Description: The online hearing has resolved the case

Name: Move to appeal created
Description: Deprecated - Moves case to appeal created

Name: Not able to register
Description: Case can't be registered on DRS

Name: Process audio/video evidence
Description: Issue a direction notice based on audio and video evidence

Name: Online hearing decision made
Description: The online hearing has resolved the case

Name: Ready to list
Description: Makes an appeal ready to list

Name: Resend to DWP via bulk print
Description: Resend case to DWP via bulk print

Name: Response received
Description: Notification that DWP have responded to the appeal

Name: Send to admin
Description: Return the case to an admin with a note

Name: Send to DWP error
Description: Flag error to Send to DWP

Name: Send to DWP offline
Description: Log manually sending a case to DWP

Name: Send to interloc
Description: Send a case to a judge for review

Name: Send to interloc - pre-valid
Description: Send a case to a judge for review

Name: Send to robotics error
Description: Flag error to Send to robotics

Name: Stop bulk print
Description: Stop a bulk print request for a reasonable adjustment

Name: Strike out case
Description: Strike out due to no response

Name: System Maintenance
Description: Maintenance updates to cases, made automatically by the system

Name: Update case only
Description: Simply update case data with no callbacks afterwards

Name: Update to case data
Description: Automatic update of data from GAPS 2 - no notification

Name: Upload further evidence
Description: Upload further evidence for pre-valid interloc

Name: Write final decision
Description: Write a final decision notice for a case

Name: Welsh- Action Postponement Req
EventEnablingCondition: unprocessedPostponementRequest="Yes" AND interlocReviewState!="awaitingInformation" AND interlocReviewState!="none" AND interlocReviewState!="awaitingAdminAction" AND interlocReviewState!="welshTranslation" AND interlocReviewState!=""

Name: Welsh - issue final decision
Description: Issue a Welsh final decision notice

Name: Welsh - process A/V evidence
Description: Issue a Welsh direction notice based on audio and video evidence

Name: Reinstate case
Description: Deprecated - Resinstates a Void case to valid

Name: Create with dwp test test
Description: Create a test case in withDwp state

Name: Create response received test
Description: Create a test case in responseReceived state

Name: Create test case
Description: Create a test case in validAppealCreated state
